name: SCNLight.LightType
desc: Constants specifying the general behavior of a light, used by the type property.

items.name: static let IES: SCNLight.LightType
items.desc: A light source whose shape, direction, and intensity of illumination is determined by a photometric profile.

items.name: static let ambient: SCNLight.LightType
items.desc: A light that illuminates all objects in the scene from all directions.

items.name: static let directional: SCNLight.LightType
items.desc: A light source with a uniform direction and constant intensity.

items.name: static let omni: SCNLight.LightType
items.desc: An omnidirectional light, also known as a point light.

items.name: static let probe: SCNLight.LightType
items.desc: A sample of the environment around a point in a scene to be used in environment-based lighting.

items.name: static let spot: SCNLight.LightType
items.desc: A light source that illuminates a cone-shaped area.
